content.rendered:
Who we are

NFR blogger, news, and information About Las Vegas Rodeo.

Our website address is https://www.sportdown.com

Types and personal information we collect

Media

If you upload a picture to a website, visitors can download it and collect the website

Cookies

We allow cookies on our site. These websites collect data about you, use cookies, contain additional third-party tracking, monitor your interactions with the content, and if you have an account and log in to those websites, the content they contain can be identified.

If you run WooCommerce at once automatically proprietary. All purchase tracking is enabled. The purchase event will send information such as order number, product ID and name, and product category. Total purchase cost, and the purchase amount to Google Analytics. Google Analytics provides anonymous IP enabled by site owners.

Tracked Activity

For E-commerce-based store-managed sites, some additional events are also sent to Google Analytics, such as adding and removing carts, viewing and clicking product lists, viewing product details, and making purchases. Tracking site owners need to enable each specific WooCommerce event.

Protection

We offer you very strong protection here, although transmission methods via the Internet or electronic storage are not 100% secure, they comply with all PCI-DSS requirements and generally apply accepted industry standards.

Contact information

If you have questions about our site. Contact us Email: admin@sportdown.com
